isis.stitle: HENDRICKSON SUSPENSION SYSTEMS - CLEAN AND INSPECT - LEAF SPRING ASSEMBLY - U/UE, RT/RTE, RT2/RTE2 SERIES

svcproc.title: LEAF SPRING ASSEMBLY - U/UE, RT/RTE, RT2/RTE2 SERIES

step1.para: Wash all the spring parts, except rubber spring bushings, in cleaning solvent, or use steam cleaning equipment to remove grease and scale. Refer to Figure 24.

note.para: Use a wire brush to remove dirt.

caution.para: Do not immerse rubber spring bushings in cleaning solvent unless you plan to replace them. Use a non-petroleum base rubber lubricant on a clean cloth to wipe the rubber parts clean.

step1.para: Replace spring pins that are worn, corroded or cracked.
Replace spring eye bushings if they are defective.
Check spring brackets for cracks, and for wear around mounting bolt holes. Check for elongated holes and cracks. Replace spring brackets that are damaged.
